summary: REQ-7 appears implemented via a top-of-page notice banner with the exact required text placed above the header in App.tsx. There is insufficient evidence in the provided diff summary that REQ-8 (removal/non-display of the specific email address) was addressed across all UI strings, including the Cash App instructions modal.

missing_requirements.requirement: Do not display the email address “sincerelykilla@icloud.com” anywhere in the UI (including header, main content, footer, and the Cash App instructions modal). If the email address exists in any frontend user-facing strings, remove it.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows changes in App.tsx plus metadata/state files, but does not show any removals/edits of user-facing strings where the email might exist (especially in CashAppInstructionsModal). Without seeing modifications to the modal or other text locations, we cannot confirm the email was removed or is not rendered.
